document.full_text: a company controlled by the dissident artist ai weiwei evaded a 'huge amount' of taxes and intentionally destroyed financial documents, the government's official news agency, reported friday.
document.title: asia: china: dissident artist is accused of tax evasion
lines_and_colors: a company controlled by the dissident artist ai weiwei evaded a 'huge amount' of taxes and intentionally destroyed financial documents, the government's official news agency, reported friday.
